channel.title: Contacts on YWallet
channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on YWallet

item.title: Add/Edit/Delete
item.description: Tap to open the QR code scanner An address should be assigned to a single contact

item.title: Save to Blockchain
item.description: Changes to your contacts are first saved locally on your device. Tap this button if you want to store them in the blockchain. The app will make a transaction that saves your contact list. It costs 0.01 mY/ZEC Remarks Contacts that are saved in the blockchain are recovered when the account is restored from its seed
